prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a shimmering blue body and bright yellow features.
Imagine a cute electric Pokemon with round eyes and long antennas, perfect for underwater adventures.
Generate a tiny aquatic creature that glows in the dark and has a friendly personality.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a small fish with large expressive eyes and playful fins.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in the sea, with a unique ability to generate light.
Give me a whimsical water and electric type Pokemon that has a charming, round shape.
Make a friendly Pokemon that loves playing in the ocean and has vibrant yellow accents.
